text:
I need help. I created custom blog template named "meetings schedule". Then I created blog from content settings named "Schedule", so I want to get posts from blog "schedule" and display them on my html page template. So I tried but I wasn't successful till now.  I tried bellow hubl functions, but they only  print posts from default blog. I want posts from Schedule blog not default.
blog_popular_posts("schedule", 3)
blog_recent_author_posts ("schedule", 3)
blog_recent_posts ("schedule", 3)
blog_recent_topic_posts ("schedule", 3)

I appreciate your assistance in advance.

I got solution, I had to pass blog ID to hubl function. eg: blog_popular_posts(100001, 3) and this 100001 is schedule blog ID while 3 is the number of posts  I want to display.    This site is explained better          <https://storyware.co/implementing-custom-post-types-custom-fields-HubSpot/>
